text.div:
Consent Status

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
A Active - Consent has been grantedadded v2.5
B Bypassed (Consent not sought)added v2.5
L Limited - Consent has been granted with limitationsadded v2.5
P Pending - Consent has not yet been soughtadded v2.5
R Refused - Consent has been refusedadded v2.5
X Rescinded - Consent was initially granted, but was subsequently revoked or ended.added v2.5

name: v2.0498
title: v2 Consent Status
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0498 ( Consent Status)

concept.display: Limited - Consent has been granted with limitations

designation.value: Beperkt - Toestemming is gegeven met beperkingen

concept.display: Pending - Consent has not yet been sought

designation.value: In bewerking - Toestemming is nog niet gevraagd

concept.display: Rescinded - Consent was initially granted, but was subsequently revoked or ended.

designation.value: Ingetrokken - Toestemming is gegeven maar vervolgens ingetrokken of beÃ«indigd
